text: Benjamin Franklin ”Frank” Thorne (June 16, 1930 – March 7, 2021)Frank Thorne at the Lambiek Comiclopedia was an American comic book artist-writer. He was best known for creating the Marvel Comics character Red Sonja. Thorne died on March 7, 2021 in Scotch Plains, New Jersey at the age of 90.Marvel Comics Artist and Longtime Scotch Plains Resident Frank Thorne Dies at Age 90; Best Known for Red Sonja Character ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American comics artists Category:American comics writers Category:Writers from New Jersey
title: Frank Thorne
